examples: そういう言い方は{誤解}{ごかい}{招}{まね}きます
Don't misunderstand me [what I say]. Don't take what I say the wrong way.｟話｠Don't get me wrong.
誤解を{招}{まね}く{説明}{せつめい}をする
give 〘him〙 a misleading explanation｟of｠.
私たちの間には何か{誤解}{ごかい}があるようです
There seems to be some misunderstanding between us.
道を迷った
We've lost our way.
生きている{限り}{かぎり}ご{親切}{しんせつ}を忘れません
I will not forget your kindness, as long as I live.

結局.english: As a result, after all, in the end
examples: 何度もやってみたが{結局}{けっきょく}だめだった。
I tried many times, but failed after all [but failed in the end, only to fail, ╳but failed at last]
古いコートを{捨}{す}てる
throw away an old coat / get rid of [discard] an old coat.
力を試す
try [test] one's strength.
この新しいローションを試してみます
I'll try this new lotion. I'll give this new lotion a try.
のっそりと起こす。
To get up sluggishly.
